featureDescription: Multiple parallax layers moving at different speeds create realistic depth perception as you scroll through the experience.
Elements respond to interactions with smooth 3D rotations and translations, creating an engaging visual hierarchy.
Dynamic gradients and color transitions guide the eye through different depth levels, enhancing the parallax effect.
Cards and orbs float independently, each with unique animation timing to create organic movement patterns.
Optimized performance ensures buttery-smooth scrolling even with multiple animated layers and effects.
Mouse-following effects and hover states add another dimension of interactivity to the parallax experience.
